bug.title: Transactions shouldn't be deleted if there's some error when exporting
bug.description:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour Export with: - format: QIF or OFX - target: DropBox, Google Drive or ownCloud - check _Delete transactions after export_ option
#### Expected behaviour If there's an error exporting the file to the selected target, no transactions are deleted.
#### Actual behaviour Transactions are deleted even when the file hasn't made to the target.
#### Software specifications * GnuCash Android version: 2.1.3
